div.bibl: Chicago Italian Chamber of Commerce, August-September-October, 1931. p. 6. PHOTOGRAPHY EXHIBIT AT "A CENTURY OF PROGRESS." CHEVALIER LAVECCHIA A COMMITTEE MEMBER.

body.p: It is planned to have a photography exhibit at the 1933 Chicago World's Fair, "A Century of Progress," at which will be displayed photographs of professionals and amateurs from all over the world.
We are pleased to note that one of our members, Chevalier John Lavecchia, has been named as a member of the Photographic Salon Committee.
Chevalier Lavecchia will represent the International Association of American Photographers.
